column5: Glad to see the back of February Starting to get the tingles for soft water.

I've always liked to think March 1st is the first day of spring. So we already there! Apparently the meteorological calendar, based on average temperatures or something agrees with me. Already seen robins, grackles, skunks and plenty of green grass. Springs here! Well, for the moment....
If history has it,at least one more big one,good thing is,snow does not last long on the ground in March. On our way for sure !!
I'll be pulling the boat out in the next two weeks(unless we get dumped on) and getting it ready. Jumbo perch and smallies are waiting!
March 12 clocks change. I hope to softwater season...
